org.sensorhub.api.common

Interface IEventProducer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IClientModule<ConfigType>, ICommNetwork<ConfigType>, ICommProvider<ConfigType>, IDataProducerModule<ConfigType>, IEventHandler, IModule<ConfigType>, IMultiSourceDataInterface, IObsStorageModule<ConfigType>, IOnDemandProcessModule<ConfigType>, IProcessModule<ConfigType>, IProcessOutput, IRecordStorageModule<ConfigType>, ISensorControlInterface, ISensorDataInterface, ISensorModule<ConfigType>, IServiceModule<ConfigType>, IStorageModule<ConfigType>, IStreamingDataInterface, IStreamProcessModule<ConfigType>

    public interface IEventProducer

    Base interface for all objects accepting producing events and accepting registration of event listeners

    Since:
    Sep 5, 2013

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerListener(IEventListener listener)
      Registers a listener with this event producer.
      void unregisterListener(IEventListener listener)
      Unregisters a listener from this event producer.

    • Method Detail

      • registerListener

        void registerListener(IEventListener listener)
        Registers a listener with this event producer. The listener is reponsible for filtering received events.
        Parameters:
        listener -

      • unregisterListener

        void unregisterListener(IEventListener listener)
        Unregisters a listener from this event producer. No more event will be sent to the listener from this producer.
        Parameters:
        listener -
